Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won the match by 73 runs
West Indies were bowled out for their 4th lowest total in T20Is
Pre-Game Insights: The match started at 7:00 PM IST with Sri Lanka winning the toss and opting to bat
Live streaming and TV channels information were provided for the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The head-to-head record between Sri Lanka and West Indies showed 8 wins each in 16 matches
The match was played at Rangiri Dambulla International Stadium, Dambulla
